column1: Funeral Services are scheduled for 1:00 pm Wednesday
column3: 2015 at Johnson-Vaughn-Phelps Funeral Home with burial in Fairview Cemetery. Visitation will be from 3:00 pm- 8:00 pm Tuesday
column5: 2015 at Johnson-Vaughn-Phelps Funeral Home and again on Wednesday from 11:00 am- 1:00 pm at the funeral home.
